title: Matplotlib Crosshair Cursor Tutorial
description: Matplotlib is a popular data visualization library that provides a wide range of tools for creating visualizations in Python. One of the interesting features of Matplotlib is the ability to add a crosshair cursor to a plot. In this lab, you will learn how to add a crosshair cursor to a Matplotlib plot.
